description: Ransomware victims have paid $459,800,000 to cybercriminals in the first half of 2024, setting the stage for a new record this year if ransom payments continue at this level. [...]
title: Ransomware rakes in record-breaking $450 million in first half of 2024

description: ​CISA has added a critical Jenkins vulnerability that can be exploited to gain remote code execution to its catalog of security bugs, warning that it's actively exploited in attacks. [...]
title: CISA warns of Jenkins RCE bug exploited in ransomware attacks

description: Flight tracking platform FlightAware is asking some users to reset their account login passwords due to a data security incident that may have exposed personal information. [...]
title: FlightAware configuration error leaked user data for years
